name: Obliteos demo
description:
This is a public demo for Obliteos, an upcoming plaformer-bullet hell game, there is no release date as of now but in the full game we plan to have:

  • Several different stages.
  • Different items, each with a unique effect.
  • Different enemy types (flying, turrets, etc.).
  • A fully fleshed story with multiple levels.

It should also be noted that the current character sprite is likely to be changed for the full game

As a bonus challenge, try beating the developers best time of 63.98 seconds, and 76.34 seconds (your best time is viewable in the statistics panel)

(This is a demo. For feedback, bug reports, or anything else, please contact us at flammabletacosoffical@gmail.com, Thank you for your time)
